alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 2:17AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Campbell County through 245 AM MDT... At 217 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Gillette Airport, or 9 miles west of Gillette, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gillette and Gillette Airport around 230 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Camplex Event Facility. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 112 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
